name: Elma
body:
### ELMA - ELectron Micrograph Analysis

ELMA is a small tool for denoising and analyzing High-Resolution STEM images.
The main application are low-dose micrographs which are extremely corrupted Poisson noise.
Currently, ELMA is focused on periodic crystals, but will be extended to more complex structures in the future.

ELMA can read/save TIFF images, as well as some other formats:
read: .tiff, .tif, .dm3, .dm4, .png, .q2bz
write: .tiff, .tif, .png, .q2bz

ELMA is available for both Windows and MacOSX.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
